  • public class OauthCallback
extends com.mendix.externalinterface.connector.RequestHandler
    Class handles the callback from the Oauth provider as the requesthandler

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void oauthCallbackService(com.mendix.m2ee.api.IMxRuntimeRequest request, com.mendix.m2ee.api.IMxRuntimeResponse response)
      This method will process the incoming request First the state of the request is checked against the value in the cookie The the code is exchanged for an Access Token The Access Token is used to retrieve information on behalf of the user with the Oauth provider
